title: UDP requests
extract: The User Datagram Protocol (UDP) is a transport layer protocol defined for use with the IP network layer protocol. ... Because of these characteristics, UDP can offer a very efficient communication transport to some applications, but has no inherent congestion control or reliability.
extract_html: The User Datagram Protocol (UDP) is a transport layer protocol defined for use with the IP network layer protocol. ... Because of these characteristics, UDP can offer a very efficient communication transport to some applications, but has no inherent congestion control or reliability.
